title: Remove newsletter subscribe component and 'Welcome to our game' text from Landing page

requirements.text: On the Landing page (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx), remove the newsletter signup/subscribe component (email input and Subscribe button) and remove any 'Welcome to our game' heading or text. Keep the game logo, the CMS-driven game description paragraph, and the 'View Press Kit' CTA button.

quotes: please on the welcome page remove the subscribe and welcome to our game.

acceptanceCriteria: The newsletter email input and Subscribe button are no longer rendered on the Landing page.
Any 'Welcome to our game' heading or label text is no longer visible on the Landing page.
The game logo (gamelogo.png) remains displayed at natural/responsive size.
The CMS-driven game description paragraph remains visible.
The 'View Press Kit' CTA button remains visible and navigates to /press-kit.
No layout regressions or broken spacing on the Landing page.

nonGoals: Modifying any other page (Press Kit, Admin Dashboard, Settings).
Removing or altering backend CMS fields.
Changing the newsletter component on any page other than the Landing page.
